title: About Us
description:
**Elite Commercial Door, Inc.** is a state licensed & insured premier company for ALL of your commercial door needs.  We can tackle your automatic, storefront or manual door projects, whether it's service, repairs or new installation!

### [CONTACT US](/#contact-us) TODAY!

locationCard.title: STATE-WIDE SERVICE
locationCard.description: We have offices & crews on the East Coast and West Coast of Florida!

businessCard.title: 25 Years
businessCard.description: We are a family owned & operated business of nearly 10 years, with over 25 years in the commercial door industry.

serviceCard.title: Service & Installation
serviceCard.description:
We can service and install Automatic Door assemblies, manual & steel door assemblies, storefront assemblies and all respective hardware.

Our automatic door technicians are *AAADM* Certified, with a wealth of knowledge & experience in various manufacturers.
